channel.title: Npc Drops Percentage
channel.description: I was wonder, is there any way to maybe change something to allow a percentage of like .5, on the Devolution/devias/dodian source?

item.title: Npc Drops Percentage
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“hinat, post:4, topic:163119”]ull find it in item2.java or somewhere, just find the drop name of the thing u want(each npc that drops has their own drop names) and add another bone like thiis:
public static int sarasword[] = {995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,15351};

public static int randomsarasword()
{
		return sarasword[(int)(Math.random()*sarasword.length)];

the 995 u see, means it drops another coin. the sarasword u see, is drop name, just add another 995, to make it like u want it to. this is the 1% drop rate i made(100%, drop and everything, i made an npc drop this…) anyhow, hope this helps, if not idk[/quote]

This topic is nearly a year old,

Nice gravedig.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Drops Percentage
item.dc:creator: @hinat hinat
item.description:
@hinat wrote:

ull find it in item2.java or somewhere, just find the drop name of the thing u want(each npc that drops has their own drop names) and add another bone like thiis:
public static int sarasword[] = {995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,995,15351};

public static int randomsarasword()
{
		return sarasword[(int)(Math.random()*sarasword.length)];

the 995 u see, means it drops another coin. the sarasword u see, is drop name, just add another 995, to make it like u want it to. this is the 1% drop rate i made(100%, drop and everything, i made an npc drop this…) anyhow, hope this helps, if not idk
